title: Spiderman One More Day (MM Masterworks Omega)[BigBonedNinja][h33
description:
[IMG]http://img166.imageshack.us/img166/135/h33tpresentsss3.gif[/IMG]

Spiderman One More Day (MM Masterworks Omega)

[quote]Spider-Man: One More Day is a four part, 2007 comic book crossover storyline, connecting all of the main Spider-Man series published by Marvel Comics. Written by J. Michael Straczynski and Joe Quesada, with art by Quesada, it concludes the storyline of the fallout of Spider-Man&#039;s actions during the 2007 Civil War crossover. It starts in Amazing Spider-Man #544, continues in Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man #24 and The Sensational Spider-Man (vol. 2) #41, and concludes in Amazing Spider-Man #545.

After his Aunt May is shot, the superhero Spider-Man searches for help in saving her life. Spider-Man meets the demon Mephisto, who offers to save her life if Spider-Man gives him his marriage. Spider-Man and his wife Mary Jane Watson agree, and this part of their history is erased from all memory so that they have never been married. The storyline serves to set-up a restructuring of the Spider-Man titles, resulting in the cancellation of Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man and The Sensational Spider-Man, replaced by Amazing Spider-Man revamped as a thrice-monthly publication.[/quote]

Thanks to all the scanners involved.

IF YOU LIKE THE BOOK, THEN BUY THE COMICS OR THE TRADES. SUPPORT YOUR LOCAL COMIC BOOK STORES AND THE INDEPENDENT PUBLISHERS!!!
